returns._0: True if user has lock for this role

lockStake(address,bytes32,uint256,uint25.details: Transfers tokens, burns entry fee, locks remainder

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getLockedStake(address,bytes32).notice: Get locked stake amount for a role

getUserRoleLocks(address).notice: Get all role locks for a user

hasRoleLock(address,bytes32).notice: Check if user has lock for a role

lockStake(address,bytes32,uint256,uint25.notice: Lock stake for a role (Registry only)

previewExitFee(address,bytes32).notice: Preview exit fee for a role

setRoleExitFee(bytes32,uint256,uint256).notice: Set exit fee configuration for a role

unlockAndTransfer(address,bytes32).notice: Unlock and transfer to user (Registry only)
